name: QUAN NGO
title: MOBILE ENGINEER
introduction:
Hello,
I'm Quan Ngo, from VietNam. I graduated as Information Security Engineer but I passionate about developing beautiful mobile apps.

I've more than 2 year experiences in mobile app development and currently I'm a Flutter developer. 

I'm opening for relocate or remote job, It'll be nice to meet you and I hope that we can work with each other!!!

experiences.description:
We use Flutter to develop E-Commercial combine with social media app startup, I work remotely with Singapore team running Scrum. 
 
Techs: Flutter, Bloc, TDD, Getx. 
 
I also take part in developing a CRM website using Flutter 2.0 for this app.

We develop Sendo's buyer app (E-Commercial platform with 10.000.000+ users on Android and IOS). 
 
The app is already built in separate Android and IOS platform. But we decide implement new feature/screens in Flutter using Flutter add to app for fast development.

We develop 2 app: 
 
1. IOT Flutter mobile app using Bluetooth to control the devices in the house. I worked with a team in France, using Flutter framework to develop the app.

2. Renting bike mobile app that can use Bluetooth to unlock the bike, My role is the main front-end react native developer.

We developed a graveyard management website using Reactjs, Nodejs and
PostgreSQL. My role is the main front-end Reactjs developer.

educations.description:
GPA: 8.0
 
My thesis: Research And Develop Edge Computing System With Container Technology For Healthcare (Using C++, Flutter, Nodejs, Docker, Kubernetes).

projects.intro_text:
My strong: ownership characteristics, care about clean and maintainable code, has worked with Android native app, Ios native app and developed Flutter plugin wrapper Android and Ios SDKs.

Below are some projects that I've worked with

projects.name: ShopForm
projects.description:
We use Flutter to develop E-Commercial combine with social media app, I work remotely part-time at night with Singapore team.

Techs: Flutter, Bloc, TDD, Getx. 
 
I also take part in developing a CRM website using Flutter 2.0 for this app.

projects.name: Sendo

We develop Sendo's buyer app (E-Commercial platform with 10.000.000+ users on Android and IOS).

The app is already built in separate Android and IOS platform. But we decide implement new feature/screens in Flutter using Flutter add to app for fast development.

We develop IOT Flutter mobile app using Bluetooth to control the devices in the house.

projects.name: AppEBike
projects.description:
We develop a renting bike mobile app that can use Bluetooth to unlock the bike.
 
My role is the main front-end react native developer.

projects.name: Martyry management website
projects.description:
This is a volunteer project in my university, we developed a martyrs management website using Reactjs, Nodejs and PostgreSQL. 
 
My role is the main front-end Reactjs developer.

projects.name: CoffeShop demo app
projects.description: We develop a coffee shop app template to demo with client.

projects.name: Flutter Icon Network
projects.description:
I developed a Flutter plugin to work with native Android/Ios sdk of Icon network (a type of coin). 
 
Native SDK: https://www.icondev.io/docs/sdk-overview

Features: create wallet, send icx to testnet, check balance, deploy smart contract, send token, check token balance.
